AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Parks and Open Spaces

decision_conditions: The details submitted are insufficient to support the discharge of condition 11 of Planning Permission 18/16440/FUL. The submitted information should be amended as followsRemove the word "indicative" you are required to submitted the proposed planting scheduleThe column stating the size of plants needs to specifically say "size at time of planting" not just "size".The plan must clearly show the locations of all of the proposed plants.Lastly, the landscaping plan should include the planting of a tree in the grass either side of the service layby, American Sweetgum (Liquidambar styraciflua) planted at 4-5m in height as a standard with a 2m clear stem would be a good choice.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 11 (Landscaping) of planning permission 18/16440/FUL (Demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of a mixed-use development comprising a food/convenience retail store (392 sqm) at ground floor level (Use Class A1) and four residential units comprising 2 x 2 bed and 2 x 3 bed self contained units above (Use Class C3) with associated parking, loading bay, landscaping and access)
